messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Maud has commited a capital crime and jhas been sentanced to death when found.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Burning Death-trap 9, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: EMERGENCY PLASMA INTERVENTION SYSTEM ACTIVATED. STAND BY.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ATTENTION. ALL CREW MUST LEAVE THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE STATION. ESCAPE HAS BEEN COMPROMISED. AREA BEING RENOVATED BY NANO-DRONES. ANY STAFF NOT OUT OF THE AREA WILL BE TRAPPED OR HARMED. STAND BY.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division Server Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Burning Death-trap 9, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. The entire right sector of your station has been compromised. Head to arrivals for a backup evacuation when your shuttle has been called. Escape Has been compromised. Head to arrivals for evacuation procedures.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Secondary Evacuation vessel has docked at arrivals. ETD:5:00.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Art Supply Storage.
